definition: to pace/to linger/to stay over/to spiral/to hover

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess
Chinese soapberry (Sapindus mukurossi)/big/pillar (old)
surname Huan

sentences.english: Here Anne had often been staying.
sentences.chinese: 安妮以前经常在这里盘桓。

sentences.english: Still in my heart retain their wonted place.
sentences.chinese: 依然盘桓在它们惯住的心田。

sentences.english: Great birds such as hawks and eagles flew in the skies above.
sentences.chinese: 大型的鸟类如各种鹰类动物在大草原的上方盘桓。

sentences.english: Yet my mind continued the idea .
sentences.chinese: 可我脑子里仍一直盘桓着这事。

sentences.english: On the nearby mountaintops, snow cover lingers, and small glaciers snake toward the river valley.
sentences.chinese: 附近的山顶上积雪盘桓，小型冰川朝着河谷蜿蜒。

sentences.english: Yet my mind continued turning the idea over.
sentences.chinese: 可我脑子里仍一直盘桓着这事。

definition: linked in a unbroken chain
variant of 流連|流连[liu2 lian2]
winding
to loiter (i.e. reluctant to leave)/to linger on
to stay at/to stop over
to return/to go back/to come back
to chat
to draw back/to move back and forth/to hesitate/in an instant
to tread/to tramp/to loiter/to hover around

to have a rest/to stay for the night/to go to bed/to sleep
to call to pay one's respect/to call on
I beg to disturb you/I trespass on your hospitality/Thank you for your hospitality!
to go to bed/to retire for the night
to occupy illegally/to seize (territory)/to entrench (oneself)
here/this place
